Noob much? You do know when you install an OS that the drivers need to be installed seperately? Windows doesn't have (has never had) drivers for every piece of hardware. You need to find your motherboard model and manufacturer, go to the manufacturer's website and download the "missing" drivers there. Then come back and apologize to Thug and thank him for what is actually an awesome upload after all.
